creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Eugene J. Carpenter
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: vase, covered, inverted pear shaped, blue on white porcelain, decorated on body with twelve leaf-shaped panels which are filled with various figure subjects; the cover has four panels of the same character, and a simple finial; leaf on bottom
title: Vase
